page.title: 09SOCIAL LIFE IN YANWORTH
page.content: The{social centre}for the village is the{Stowell Park Social Club}based in what was once the{old Reading Room. Membership is not restricted to those living or working on the farm estate and the social activities mean Yanworth has more to offer than other villages. With younger farm workers coming onto the estate in the last ten years and often from a non farming background the club helps to keep the the idea of a village community. The club means a lot to the older people. { Bingo}is a monthly attraction and the{youth club}meets every Monday. The {Social Club }itself is held on three nights a week and Saturday night is for{Stowell Park Cricket Club. Appropriately in this farming area the{Harvest Festival Supper }is one important village event organised by the club.
